author: Alovchin91
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement

As a user I want to use `winget` to install PowerShell arm64 on my Surface Pro X / Snapdragon Development Kit.

## Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

Currently the implementation is blocked by either #12116 or https://github.com/microsoft/winget-cli/issues/140. Whichever is implemented first could unblock this story.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Windows arm64 installation via winget
